column1: #Text=Arabic ( العَرَبِيَّة‎ ) is a group of Semitic dialects spoken by more than 420 million people , mainly in North Africa and the Middle East .
#Text=The literary form ( Modern Standard Arabic , MSA ) is the liturgical language for 1.6 billion Muslims and is the official written form of the language .
#Text=For communication purposes while traveling and using this guide , it is very important to note the differences between MSA and dialects since they are largely mutually unintelligible .
#Text=Well-educated people will generally be able to understand MSA , but usually respond in their local dialects .
#Text=Comprehension of dialects between different regions will drop significantly .
#Text=It is therefore recommended that travelers focus on learning the relevant dialect for their destination for spoken communication , while using MSA as a written reference .
#Text=Arabic script is written in a cursive script , even in print .
#Text=Most letters change their shapes depending on their position ( initial , medial or final ) .
#Text=Pronunciation varies regionally , but here is the loose description :
#Text=Some in this still need to be translated .
#Text=If you know anything about this language , you can by and .
#Text=( formal ) : السلام عليكم as-salaamu ` alaikum ( used only by muslims )
#Text=Thank you [ very much ] . : [ شكرا [ جزيلا shukran [ jaziilan ] .
#Text=Nice to meet you . : تشرفنا tasharafna lit . " You honor us "
#Text=Excuse me . ( getting attention ) : لو سمحت lau samaHt
#Text=Excuse me . ( begging pardon ) : انا اسفه / انا اسف ana aasif ( male ) / ana aasifah ( female )
#Text=I 'm sorry . : انا اسفه / انا اسف ana aasif ( male ) / ana aasifah ( female )
#Text=I ca n't speak Arabic [ well ] . : [ لا اتكلم العربية [ جيدا laa atakallam al-`arabiyyah [ jayyidan ]
#Text=Is there someone here who speaks English ? :
#Text=هل هنا اي شخص يتكلم الانجليزية؟ hal hunaa ayy shakhS yatakallam al-ingliziyya ?
#Text=وانت من اهل الخير wa anta min ahl al-khair
#Text=I do n't understand . : لا افهم laa afham
#Text=Leave me alone . : اتركني / اتركيني utrukni ( to a male ) / utrukiini ( to a female )
#Text=Do n't touch me ! : ما تلمسني ma tilmisni
#Text=I 'm sick . : انا مريض / انا مريضة ana mariiD ( male ) / ana mariiDah ( female )
#Text=Can I use your phone ? : هل ممكن استخدم التلفون؟
#Text=1000 : الف alf ( as in The Thousand and One Nights - الف ليلة وليلة Alf Layla wa Layla )
#Text=straight ahead : على طول Ala Tool ( Egyptian ) or illal amaama الى الامام ; dughri ( Jordan ) ; quduman ( general )
#Text=to or at ( a place ) : الى ilah
